name: Komuu
greetingText: Wish you all the best yaa!
wishText: May God bless you my love and fill your life with boundless joy. Wishing good health always to Pappa, Mummy, Vedu, and of course, to you my Cutie. Happy Birthday, Rani! 💖
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah!!🥳 🥳 🥳
text2: I was actually going to text you that...
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are special to me Jannu 💖
outroText: Hope you liked it! Khup bheta vatat ahe :D
replayText: If you want to see it again, you can click this Madam
